Text:
dude!

the imdb link is already there! and a way superior plain text link, too. open your eyes!

Hmm, how is a plain text url superior to a link? It takes one middle-click to open a link in a new tab but at least 6 clicks (or various clicks and keypresses, whichever your prefer) to open a text url.

I personally much appreciate the habit of providing a link to the appropriate imdb title as a comment. Thanks C64 :)
i hear ya sunrhone! c64's a hero ;)
